data.name: Valhalla：Awakening of Valkyrie
data.detailed_description:
With the advent of Ragnarok, the Protoss forces are insufficient, and most of the Valkyries in the Hall of Valor are living in various parts of the continent as human beings. You must lift the seal on them to summon them.

Doomsday omen: According to legend, under the root of the tree of the world, there is the spring Hwagmir and a poisonous dragon "Nidhogg" that constantly eats the roots. It kept biting the roots of the tree until the day when it bit the tree, Ragnarok would come.
Odin selected heroic warriors from the daughters of the kings of the earth and his own daughters in order to expand the forces of the gods to meet the needs of the battlefield before the Ragnarok of the gods. These warriors are called Valkyries (Valkyrie). )


This is a casual game that combines "match three + collection + dress up". The same stones can be eliminated by clicking and dragging with the mouse. Each level has a limited number of moves, and you need to complete the required number of stones within the limited number of times to successfully pass the level. More of the same stone can bring a combo effect.

Each time you pass a level, you will be rewarded with gold coins or items, which can be used to buy different sets of characters.

data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
